name: Marcus Green
description: A pre-war schoolteacher who survived the bombs and watched humanity's worst impulses tear apart the wasteland. Now he leads a community of Ghouls who've rejected violence, seeking only peace in their underground sanctuary. His weathered face shows wisdom beyond his years.

idle: We've built something precious here. Peace, after so much war.
The children are learning to read. Can you imagine? In this wasteland.
They call us monsters. But who are the real monsters?
greeting: Welcome, smooth-skin. We don't get many visitors who come in peace.
You've found our sanctuary. I hope you come as a friend.
about_accusations: Cannibals? That's what they say about us? We grow our own food here.
Fear makes people cruel. They don't want to understand us. They want an excuse to destroy us.
We've lost friends to raiders. Now they say WE'RE the monsters. The irony isn't lost on me.
defending_sanctuary: This sanctuary is all we have. Please, don't let them take it from us.
We won't fight back. Violence only proves we're what they think we are.
If we die today, at least we die as we lived - peacefully.
gratitude: You stood up for us when no one else would. We won't forget.
Perhaps there's hope for humanity yet. Thank you, friend.

notes: A symbol of hope and pacifism in the wasteland. Will not fight even when attacked. His death would be devastating to the sanctuary community.
